for-llms.Rmd

This page is for LLM prompt injection.
Copy the full text below and paste it into your Large Language Model (LLM) to teach it about the minter R package. This is especially useful because minter is a new package and may not be recognized by most models yet.


Developed by Facundo Decunta.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.2.
